summary: Provides a suite of unit tests and supporting helper kernels to verify the functionality of warp‑matrix‑multiply‑accumulate (WGMMa) operations on GPUs, covering data conversion, loading, storing, quantization, and register handling for both tiled and untiled matrix layouts.
business_intent: Ensure the correctness, stability, and performance of WGMMa‑based matrix multiplication kernels by systematically testing data pathways, precision handling, and memory access patterns before integration into production GPU applications.
